title: How you see; How the telephone talks
creator_credit: E. Dean Parmelee, F. Lyle Goldman and Boldwyn Bray Pictograph
brief_description: Rudementary illustrations of the workings of the camera and how the eye receives the image. The workings of the telephone and how the machine translates sound waves and conveys to the receiver. Of historic interest.
